entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 24 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the evening. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
